step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap, maintaining a relaxed posture.
You're raising your hands, but try to keep your elbows closer to your head as you bring them towards your forehead.
Nicely done! You're spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Excellent hold! You maintained the position well, keeping your shoulders relaxed.
Good return. You reversed the motion smoothly back to the starting position.
Second rep starting well. Ensure your hands are clasped and resting comfortably in your lap.
You're bringing your hands up, but focus on keeping your elbows tucked in closer to your head this time.
Great job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Remember to keep your head up and avoid any forward strain.
Well held! You maintained good form and control throughout the hold.
Excellent finish! You returned to the start with good control, completing the exercise.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Focus on keeping your elbows close to your head as you raise your hands, and remember to spread them wide behind your head while keeping your head upright. This helps maximize the stretch and lymph flow.
